description_en: Weekly retail prices of RON95 petrol, RON97 petrol, and diesel in Malaysia.
description_ms: Harga runcit mingguan bagi petrol RON95, petrol RON97 dan diesel di Malaysia.
methodology_en: This dataset presents the weekly retail price of RON95 petrol, RON97 petrol, and diesel in Malaysia. Since April 2017, the retail price of fuel in Malaysia has been set on a weekly basis (except for a short period at the end of 2018 where it was announced monthly) using the Automatic Pricing Mechanism (APM). The APM is designed to allow the government to monitor the effects of changes in global crude oil prices and adjust retail fuel prices to ensure the continued welfare of the rakyat.
methodology_ms: Data ini memaparkan harga runcit mingguan bagi petrol RON95, petrol RON97 dan diesel di Malaysia. Sejak April 2017, harga runcit petrol di Malaysia telah ditetapkan pada kadar mingguan (kecuali setempoh di hujung tahun 2018 ketika harga diumumkan secara bulanan) dengan menggunakan formula Mekanisme Harga Automatik (APM). Formula APM dikhususkan untuk memboleh kerajaan memantau kesan perubahan harga minyak mentah global dan mengambil langkah bersesuaian bagi memastikan kebajikan rakyat terus terpelihara.
caveat_en:
The following information should be incorporated into any analysis of fuel prices in Malaysia:

- Malaysia's goods and services tax (GST) was zero-rated on 1 June 2018, with the sales and services tax (SST) subsequently implemented on 1 September 2018. However, because petrol and diesel prices are controlled by the government, they were not affected by this.
- Beginning 3 March 2021, the announcement of fuel prices was changed from Fridays to Wednesdays.
- On 10 June 2024, diesel subsidies were removed in Peninsular Malaysia, leading to a discontinuous jump from RM2.15 to RM3.35 per litre. Therefore, beginning 13 June 2024, the weekly price of diesel was announced separately for Peninsular Malaysia and East Malaysia (Sarawak, Sabah, W.P. Labuan).
caveat_ms:
Maklumat tersebut harus diambil kira dalam mana-mana analisis harga bahan api di Malaysia:

- Kadar cukai perkhidmatan dan barangan (GST) di Malaysia disifarkan pada 1 Jun 2018, dengan pelaksanaan cukai jualan dan perkhidmatan (SST) berkuatkuasa pada 1 September 2018. Namun, oleh kerana harga petrol dan diesel di Malaysia dikawal oleh kerajaan, maka harganya tidak terkesan oleh pertukaran tersebut.
- Bermula 3 Mac 2021, pengumuman harga petrol dan diesel diubah dari hari Jumaat ke hari Rabu.
- Pada 10 Jun 2024, subsidi diesel dimansuhkan di Semenanjung Malaysia, menyebabkan harga diesel meningkat dari RM2.15 ke RM3.35 seliter. Oleh itu, bermula 13 Jun 2024, pengumuman mingguan harga diesel dibuat secara berasingan bagi Semenanjung Malaysia dan Malaysia Timur (Sarawak, Sabah, W.P. Labuan).
publication_en: [MoF's weekly press statement](https://www.mof.gov.my/portal/en/component/tags/tag/price-of-petroleum) on the retail price of petroleum products.
publication_ms: [Kenyataan akhbar mingguan MoF](https://www.mof.gov.my/portal/ms/component/tags/tag/price-of-petroleum) mengenai harga runcit produk petroleum.

fields.name: series_type
fields.description_en: [categorical] Price in RM (level), or weekly change in RM (change_weekly).
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Harga dalam RM (level), ataupun perubahan harga mingguan dalam RM (change_weekly).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date of effect of the price, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh harga berkuatkuasa, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: ron95
fields.description_en: [Float] Price per litre of RON95 petrol, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Harga seliter petrol RON95, dalam RM

fields.name: ron97
fields.description_en: [Float] Price per litre of RON97 petrol, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Harga seliter petrol RON97, dalam RM

fields.name: diesel
fields.description_en: [Float] Price per litre of diesel in Peninsular Malaysia, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Harga seliter diesel di Semenanjung Malaysia, dalam RM

fields.name: diesel_eastmsia
fields.description_en: [Float] Price per litre of diesel in East Malaysia, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Harga seliter diesel di Malaysia Timur, dalam RM
